questions.question_text: Case escalation rules triggered on the last modification will be reset each time a user adds an activity or sends an email from the case record?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
When a user adds a related comment to a case in Salesforce, it is considered a modification to the case. Therefore, if the case escalation rules are triggered based on the last modification, they will be reset each time a user adds a related comment to the case.
